tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    current_stock INT NOT NULL,
    optimal_stock INT NOT NULL,
    restock_threshold INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RestockHistory (
    restock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    restock_date DATE,
    quantity_added INT,
    restock_location TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES Inventory(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity_in_stock INT,
    restock_threshold INT
);

CREATE TABLE restock_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    product_id INT,
    warehouse_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    last_stocked DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (product_id, warehouse_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouses(warehouse_id)
);

CREATE TABLE restocking_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    warehouse_id INT,
    restocked_quantity INT,
    restock_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES warehouses(warehouse_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryItems (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
quantity INT NOT NULL,
price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
contact_person VARCHAR(50),
phone_number VARCHAR(15));

CREATE TABLE Orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_id INT,
quantity INT,
order_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES InventoryItems(id));

CREATE TABLE Sales (sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_id INT,
quantity_sold INT,
sale_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES InventoryItems(id));

CREATE TABLE Stockouts (stockout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
item_id INT,
stockout_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES InventoryItems(id));
